Subject: recrawling by action directory

--001a114ff3a275361a055fe72c48
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"

Hi, I am archiving urls by submitting seeds(F+ .force) into action
directory with maxhops=1.
Heritrix crawls(maxhops=1) the submitted urls first time, but after that
only submitted urls have been archived.
Is there way to force recrawling of submitted seeds in action directory?

Heritrix 3.3.0

So far, I am tearing down a job and relaunch it. (then submit seeds, which
get crawled)

--001a114ff3a275361a055fe72c48
Content-Type: text/html; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
